org.opentosca.toscana.plugins.kubernetes.docker.image

Class ExportingImageBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opentosca.toscana.plugins.kubernetes.docker.image.ImageBuilder
      • org.opentosca.toscana.plugins.kubernetes.docker.image.ExportingImageBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.spotify.docker.client.ProgressHandler

    public class ExportingImageBuilder
extends ImageBuilder
    Allows the automatic building of a Dockerfile if a docker daemon is available.

    The built images will be Exported into .tar.gz archives using the docker store command.
